snippet: The full weight of the law must be brought down on the perpetrators of another horrific gang rape.
abstract: Editorial expresses alarm at yet another gang rape making headlines in India; notes that a village council in state of West Bengal ordered that an Adivasi woman be raped as punishment for her relationship with a Muslim man; thirteen men, including the village chief, are alleged to have raped the woman; contends that Indian authorities must not back down, and full weight of India's law must be brought down on these perpetrators and other such brazen affronts to the rule of law.
lead_paragraph: The full weight of the law must be brought down on the perpetrators of another horrific gang rape.
